name: Canis lupus arctos
description:
Every year during the third full week of October it's Wolf Awareness Week. To celebrate we're introducing you to the wolf species and subspecies found throughout North America.

Common Name: Arctic Wolf
Latin Name: Canis lupus arctos
Location: Arctic Region of Alaska and Canada

To help reduce heat loss in temperatures that can drop to -70°f, Arctic wolves have developed more rounded ears, a shorter muzzle, and shorter legs than other subspecies.

Twitter: @_GraffitiSky
